description: Enable AI-powered process analysis, chart generation, and optimization recommendations for your workflows. Upload various file types and receive intelligent insights and visual diagrams to improve efficiency and compliance. Streamline process management with batch processing and cross-analysis capabilities.

CUSTOM_API_KEY.description: API key for any additional third-party services (optional)

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Your Anthropic API key for AI analysis features

LUCIDCHART_DEFAULT_FOLDER_ID.description: Default folder ID for Lucidchart documents (optional)

capabilities.name: add_resource
capabilities.description: Add a resource to a process

capabilities.name: analyze_resource_utilization
capabilities.description: Analyze how resources are being utilized across processes

capabilities.name: analyze_dependencies
capabilities.description: Identify critical resource dependencies and bottlenecks

capabilities.name: optimize_allocation
capabilities.description: Generate recommendations for optimal resource allocation

capabilities.name: create_prompt
capabilities.description: Create a custom prompt template for specific analysis needs

capabilities.name: execute_prompt
capabilities.description: Execute a prompt with specific variables and context

capabilities.name: list_prompts
capabilities.description: Get all available prompt templates (built-in and custom)

capabilities.name: analyze_process_image
capabilities.description: Extract process information from images using Claude Vision

capabilities.name: extract_visual_process
capabilities.description: Extract detailed process elements from images with confidence scoring

capabilities.name: lucidchart_create_document
capabilities.description: Create a new document in Lucidchart using the REST API

capabilities.name: lucidchart_upload_document
capabilities.description: Upload a CSV document to Lucidchart via REST API

capabilities.name: lucidchart_import_csv
capabilities.description: Import CSV data to create shapes in existing Lucidchart document
